name: Battle Skirt, Black
description: Our basic battle skirt was created for those who want to be comfortable during battle.  This full length unisex medieval skirt has an adjustable drawstring waist and has openings on all sides allowing for easy movement.  All the openings are re-enforced to resist tear and was intended to be used during epic war battles.

name: Black Ice Battleskirt
description: The Black Ice Battle Skirt provides a bold statement on the Battlefield. This Larp war skirt has a unique style that tends to draw attention to your cause. The bold blue combined with a black stripe provides a bold look that any larp warrior can appreciate and the comfort is unsurpassed.
